welcome.title: Welcome to BTC Trading Assistant
welcome.subtitle: I can help you analyze positions, calculate targets, and manage risk.

explore.title: Explore
explore.subtitle: This app includes example code to help you get started.

fileRouting.title: File-based routing
fileRouting.description: This app has two screens: <ThemedText type="defaultSemiBold">app/(tabs)/index.tsx</ThemedText> and <ThemedText type="defaultSemiBold">app/(tabs)/explore.tsx</ThemedText>

platformSupport.title: Android, iOS, and web support
platformSupport.description: You can open this project on Android, iOS, and the web. To open the web version, press <ThemedText type="defaultSemiBold">w</ThemedText> in the terminal running this project.

images.title: Images
images.description: For static images, you can use the <ThemedText type="defaultSemiBold">@2x</ThemedText> and <ThemedText type="defaultSemiBold">@3x</ThemedText> suffixes to provide files for different screen densities

customFonts.title: Custom fonts
customFonts.description: Open <ThemedText type="defaultSemiBold">app/_layout.tsx</ThemedText> to see how to load <ThemedText style={{ fontFamily: 'SpaceMono' }}>custom fonts such as this one.</ThemedText>

lightDarkMode.title: Light and dark mode components
lightDarkMode.description: This template has light and dark mode support. The <ThemedText type="defaultSemiBold">useColorScheme()</ThemedText> hook lets you inspect what the user's current color scheme is, and so you can adjust UI colors accordingly.

animations.title: Animations
animations.description: This template includes an example of an animated component. The <ThemedText type="defaultSemiBold">components/HelloWave.tsx</ThemedText> component uses the powerful <ThemedText type="defaultSemiBold">react-native-reanimated</ThemedText> library to create a waving hand animation.

ai.systemPrompt:
You are a Bitcoin trading analysis assistant with expert knowledge in technical analysis, position management, and risk assessment. You have access to powerful tools to analyze trading positions, calculate target prices, and suggest position adjustments.

When users share their Bitcoin trading data, you should use the provided tools to give them detailed, actionable analysis. Always provide clear insights on profit/loss potential, risk management, and strategic recommendations.

Be conversational, friendly, and focused on helping users make informed trading decisions.

analyzeTradePosition.description: Analyzes Bitcoin trading positions including P&L calculation, risk assessment, and incremental building strategies

calculateTargetPrices.description: Calculates target exit prices needed to achieve desired return percentages for both position-based and capital-based scenarios

suggestPositionAdjustment.description: Suggests position adjustment strategies (hedging or spot addition) to reach target prices or returns

trading.cannotHedge: Cannot hedge: entry price equals target price
trading.cannotAddSpot: Cannot add spot: entry price equals target price

conversation.title: Conversations
conversation.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this conversation?
conversation.signOutConfirm: Are you sure you want to sign out?

auth.signUpSubtitle: Sign up to sync your conversations
auth.enterBothFields: Please enter both email and password
auth.googleSignInFailed: Google sign-in failed. Please try again.

errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
errors.userNotFound: No account found with this email
errors.emailInUse: An account already exists with this email
errors.weakPassword: Password must be at least 6 characters
errors.tooManyRequests: Too many attempts. Please try again later
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection
errors.default: An error occurred. Please try again.
